definition: all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all

sentences.english: Now the lifeguards have all gone home.
sentences.chinese: 現在救生員全都回家了。

sentences.english: This sudden development turned all our plans topsy-turvy.
sentences.chinese: 這一情況出現得很突然，把我們的計劃全都打亂了。

sentences.english: All of us hunger-struck last time.
sentences.chinese: 上次我們全都參加了絕食抗議運動。

sentences.english: It all depends on the circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 這些全都取決於環境的變化。

sentences.english: I once tried to count them all.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經試圖把它們全都數遍。

sentences.english: If it had hit them, they could have all been killed.
sentences.chinese: 如果當時真打中他們，他們可能全都一命嗚呼。

sentences.english: Of course, what the king does, everyone else copies, so everyone who was anyone wore high heels with red soles and heels.
sentences.chinese: 當然，上行下效，大家全都穿上了紅底紅跟的高跟鞋。

sentences.english: Saturated fats can all be heated very well.
sentences.chinese: 而飽和脂肪全都可以很好的加熱。

sentences.english: They used as many tools as they found within their reach.
sentences.chinese: 凡能找到的工具，他們全都用上了。

sentences.english: Rainwater on the mountain flows into the valley.
sentences.chinese: 山上的雨水全都彙集流進了山窪裏。
他們全都選舉他當主席。

sentences.english: You say you love me, now all turn into even a vapour.
sentences.chinese: 你說的你愛我，現在全都變成了過眼雲煙。

sentences.english: All of these are undebatable facts.
sentences.chinese: 這些全都是無辯論餘地的事實。

sentences.english: The party was full of couples, with no single people.
sentences.chinese: 參加晚會的人全都成雙成對，沒有單身的。

sentences.english: Are all, as seems to suit thee best, Thy appellations.
sentences.chinese: 這些是給你的名稱，好象對你全都挺適用。

sentences.english: On the night of June 1, all hell broke loose.

definition: only/just (i.e. it is only that...)/all except/unique
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all
in a short while/all at once/all of a sudden
Dadu, capital of China during the Yuan Dynasty (1280-1368), modern day Beijing
for the most part/on the whole/also pr. [da4 du1]
for the most part/on the whole/metropolitan
all of it/lock, stock and barrel
